awards.title: CatAlyZe Accelerate Award
awards.summary: Recognized for exemplifying AstraZeneca's 'We Play to Win' value (building high-performing, inclusive and diverse teams and making the right choices to win) through my contributions to a pilot project that will improve the way patient laboratory data is recorded in clinical databases
